info.author: Iseuwei
info.description:
niconico
===============

* （°－°）つ

Target Users
--------------

* anyone

Installation
--------------

    pip install niconico
    
Upgrade
---------------

    pip install niconico --upgrade
    
Quick Start
--------------

::

    from niconico import BiliBili

    chi = BiliBili()
    chi.user_update()								# 在线更新user列表
    
    
return::


                                视频地址                           专栏地址                           相册地址  
    0  https://api.bilibili.com/x...  https://api.bilibili.com/x...  https://api.bilibili.com/x...  
    1  https://api.bilibili.com/x...  https://api.bilibili.com/x...  https://api.bilibili.com/x...  
    2  https://api.bilibili.com/x...  https://api.bilibili.com/x...  https://api.bilibili.com/x...  
    3  https://api.bilibili.com/x...  https://api.bilibili.com/x...  https://api.bilibili.com/x...  
    4  https://api.bilibili.com/x...  https://api.bilibili.com/x...  https://api.bilibili.com/x...  
    5  https://api.bilibili.com/x...  https://api.bilibili.com/x...  https://api.bilibili.com/x...  
    6  https://api.bilibili.com/x...  https://api.bilibili.com/x...  https://api.bilibili.com/x...  
    7  https://api.bilibili.com/x...  https://api.bilibili.com/x...  https://api.bilibili.com/x...  
    8  https://api.bilibili.com/x...  https://api.bilibili.com/x...  https://api.bilibili.com/x...  
    9  https://api.bilibili.com/x...  https://api.bilibili.com/x...  https://api.bilibili.com/x...
info.name: niconico
info.html_description:
• （°－°）つ

Target Users

  • anyone

Installation

pip install niconico

Upgrade

pip install niconico –upgrade

Quick Start

from niconico import BiliBili

chi = BiliBili()
chi.user_update()                                                           # 在线更新user列表

return:

                            视频地址                           专栏地址                           相册地址
0  https://api.bilibili.com/x...  https://api.bilibili.com/x...  https://api.bilibili.com/x...
1  https://api.bilibili.com/x...  https://api.bilibili.com/x...  https://api.bilibili.com/x...

8  https://api.bilibili.com/x...  https://api.bilibili.com/x...  https://api.bilibili.com/x...
9  https://api.bilibili.com/x...  https://api.bilibili.com/x...  https://api.bilibili.com/x...
